sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Be merry and wise, or A seasonable word to the nation. Shewing the cause, the growth, the state, and the cure of our present distempers.
[2], 6 p.
[s.n.], London, : Printed March 13. in the year, 1660.
A variant of the edition lacking "March. 13." in imprint. Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 14. 1659"; the imprint year has been crossed out and replaced with "1659". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
